description: Garlic and shrimp take center stage in this classic Spanish dish, which is served as a tapa in Spain but also makes a great main dish Serve with rice, or if serving in earthenware dishes, with crusty bread for dipping.
title: Spanish-Style Shrimp With Garlic
title_page: Spanish-Style Shrimp With Garlic Recipe - NYT Cooking
